resources.string: Collaborate with a pool of friends,family, or co-workers
We have sent you an SMS with a 4-digit code to the number 415-815-4047
This is how we will send updates and contact you if you win big!
If not selected pool members will be able to contribute until the end of the pool duration and beyond target amount
YOU MUST BE 18 YEARS OR OLDER TO BE ELIGIBLE TO PARTICIPATE IN THE LOTTERY. ANY INELIGIBLE TICKET PLAY WILL BE TREATED AS AN INCLAIMED PRIZE
